2162.subject: SBS
2162.descrlong:
Examination of Historical Methods.  This course immerses students in the ways that Historians develop work in their fields, create a written narrative, use sources, and become professional historians.  Students engage the historical method through research, writing, oral communication, and analysis.   (Offered Every Fall Semester) (Credit/No Credit Available)

(Prereq: GE Area A1 and A2 and A3)
